entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 March 2023
